author: Mohd Sohaib
title: Expected Look Of the Apple iPhone 16 Pro, iPhone 16 Pro Max Leaked | Cashify News
text: The good news for Apple enthusiasts, the upcoming [Apple iPhone 16](https://www.cashify.in/apple-iphone-16-price-in-india) look got leaked. the upcoming look of the Apple iPhone 16. There are still months until the new iPhone launches, but the rumours are in full swing. So we got the news that the possible [Apple iPhone 16 Pro](https://www.cashify.in/apple-iphone-16-pro-price-in-india) and [Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max](https://www.cashify.in/apple-iphone-16-pro-max-price-in-india) models have been revealed for the first time. Now, analyst Ming-Chi Kuo has drafted the major upgrades for the 2024 and 2025 Apple iPhone series in its latest report. You may also see the price increment of the model. Let’s read the full news to know about the new look. Read More: [How To Reverse Image Search](https://www.cashify.in/how-to-do-reverse-image-search-google) New About Expected iPhone 16 Look MacRumors has created renders of the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max based on this year’s iPhone Pro prototype models. So, it shows what we can expect from the upcoming iPhone series. According to multiple leaks, it could be due to a new telephoto camera module expected to be included in the Pro model. Because, last year, only the iPhone 15 Pro Max was equipped with a telephoto lens. But this year, due to the larger area, it is expected that both Pro models will be equipped with a telephoto lens. Read More: [How To Set Up Google My Business Account In 2 Minutes?](https://www.cashify.in/how-to-set-up-google-my-business-account-easy-guide) Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said the new model will have larger displays of 6.3 inches and 6.9 inches instead of 6.1 inches and 6.7 inches. It is also claimed that the standard 12-megapixel ultra-wide-angle camera will be expanded to a 48-megapixel 1/2.55-inch (0.7μm) unit. However, this lens still produces a 12MP, 1.4µm pixel binned image. The ultra-wide angle inherits the 6MP lens design. Read More: [Alexa Vs Google Home: Best Smart Assistant To Choose!](https://www.cashify.in/alexa-vs-google-home-comparison-which-one-is-the-best) Lastly Apple initially experimented with a four-button configuration. But, appears to have opted for a layout similar to the iPhone 15 Pro, with action and volume buttons on the left and a power button on the right. There may be some other upgrades as well. Rumour has it that all iPhone 16 models this year will be equipped with the company’s A18 chipset. Ming-Chi Kuo recently claimed that all iPhone 16 models will come with iOS 18. It also features AI-powered Siri, an improved microphone, and ChatGPT.
